com.microsoft.azure.v2.management.resources.fluentcore.model

Interface Refreshable<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the fluent type of the resource
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ApplicationGateway, ApplicationSecurityGroup, AvailabilitySet, DdosProtectionPlan, Deployment, DeploymentOperation, Disk, DiskVolumeEncryptionMonitor, ExpressRouteCircuit, ExpressRouteCircuitPeering, ExpressRouteCrossConnection, ExpressRouteCrossConnectionPeering, ExternalChildResource<FluentModelT,ParentT>, FlowLogSettings, Gallery, GalleryImage, GalleryImageVersion, GenericResource, Identity, LoadBalancer, LocalNetworkGateway, Network, NetworkInterface, NetworkPeering, NetworkSecurityGroup, NetworkWatcher, PolicyAssignment, PolicyDefinition, PublicIPAddress, ResourceGroup, RouteFilter, RouteTable, SecurityGroupView, Snapshot, StorageAccount, TrafficManagerAzureEndpoint, TrafficManagerEndpoint, TrafficManagerExternalEndpoint, TrafficManagerNestedProfileEndpoint, TrafficManagerProfile, VirtualMachine, VirtualMachineCustomImage, VirtualMachineExtension, VirtualMachineScaleSet, VirtualMachineScaleSetNetworkInterface, VirtualMachineScaleSetVM, VirtualNetworkGateway, VirtualNetworkGatewayConnection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    com.microsoft.azure.v2.management.resources.fluentcore.model.implementation.CreatableUpdatableImpl, com.microsoft.azure.v2.management.resources.fluentcore.arm.models.implementation.GroupableParentResourceImpl, GroupableParentResourceWithTagsImpl, com.microsoft.azure.v2.management.resources.fluentcore.arm.models.implementation.GroupableResourceImpl, com.microsoft.azure.v2.management.resources.fluentcore.model.implementation.IndexableRefreshableImpl, com.microsoft.azure.v2.management.resources.fluentcore.model.implementation.IndexableRefreshableWrapperImpl, com.microsoft.azure.v2.management.resources.fluentcore.arm.models.implementation.ResourceImpl

    public interface Refreshable<T>
    Base class for resources that can be refreshed to get the latest state.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T refresh()
      Refreshes the resource to sync with Azure.
      io.reactivex.Maybe<T> refreshAsync()
      Refreshes the resource to sync with Azure.

    • Method Detail

      • refresh

        T refresh()
        Refreshes the resource to sync with Azure.
        Returns:
        the refreshed resource

      • refreshAsync

        io.reactivex.Maybe<T> refreshAsync()
        Refreshes the resource to sync with Azure.
        Returns:
        the Observable to refreshed resource
